# About

This document contains all runs in the Results folder of the repository.

```{r setup, echo=FALSE}
source("aana_utils.R")
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
repo_path <- "../cai-anl-33/"

results_dir <- dir(paste(repo_path, 'results/', sep=''))
cat(file=stderr(), sprintf("Results directory: %d entries", length(results_dir)))

git_rev <- substr(system2(c("git", "-C", repo_path, "reflog"), stdout=TRUE), 1, 7)
cat(file=stderr(), sprintf("Git revision '%s'", git_rev))
```

```{r, results="asis", echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, fig.height=5.1, fig.width=6, fig.align='center'}

cat(sprintf("Git repository at \\verb|%s|, version \\verb|%s|.", repo_path, git_rev))

for (results in results_dir) {

  cat(sprintf("\n\n# Results at %s\n", results))
  result_data <- try(
    read_results(repo_path, results_name = results)
  )
  if (inherits(result_data, "try-error")) {
    cat(geterrmessage())
    next;
  }
  
  plot_run_results(result_data)
}
```
